body.p: The Board developed the amendment in paragraph 102V of IAS 39 to address the potential effect in hedge accounting at the date the Phase 1 exception from the retrospective assessment in paragraph 102G of IAS 39 ceases to apply. Therefore, the amendment in paragraph 102V of IAS 39 only applies at that date ie the date that the exception from the retrospective assessment in paragraph 102G of IAS 39 ceases to apply.
